title: England fans celebrate Agyemang stoppage-time equaliser
summary: Fans at Box Park Wembley celebrate Michelle Agyemang's stoppage-time equaliser for England in their semi-final victory against Italy at Euro 2025.

title: Bonansea punishes poor England defending to put Italy in front
summary: England fall behind after Barbara Bonansea opens the scoring for Italy on 33 minutes in the semi-final of Euro 2025.

title: Agyemang scores late equaliser to send England to extra time
summary: Michelle Agyemang equalises in the final minutes to send England to extra time against Italy in their Euro 2025 semi-final victory.

title: Kelly scores rebound after penalty saved to send England through
summary: Chloe Kelly scores the rebound after she has her penalty saved in the 118th minute to win the game 2-1 against Italy and send England through to the final of Euro 2025.

title: 'Defence lived charmed life - but Rangers take precious lead to Athens'
summary: Russell Martin's era at Rangers begins with victory against Panathinaikos.

title: Kelly's extra-time penalty secures England victory over Italy
summary: England stage an incredibly late comeback to reach the Euro 2025 final with a 96th-minute equaliser from Michelle Agyemang and an extra-time penalty from Chloe Kelly.
